Twi_0.Line: "Hello, Trixie. What brings you here today?"

0: "Greetings, Sparkle. Trixie is just idling today."
1: "Trixie has come to challenge you, Sparkle!"

Twi_Greetings_1.Line: "Oh, okay. Just let me know if you need something."

Twi_Challenge_1.Line: "What? Why do you have to do this all the time, Trixie?"

1: "Relax, Sparkle. Trixie is merely playing a joke on you."
2: "Oh, never mind. What do you know about Discord?"

0: "Haha, you fell for it! Fear not, Sparkle. Trixie will not fight you today."
"Oh, never mind. What do you know about Discord?"

Twi_About_Discord_1.Line: "Discord? He's the spirit of chaos and disharmony, he's a huge jerk, and he's friends with Fluttershy. If you want to know more, ask her."

0: "Never mind. Trixie has come to challenge you, Sparkle!"
